name: portfolio
description: | Package                       | Purpose                                                            | | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | | `gsap`                        | GreenSock Animation Platform â€“ powerful animation library.         | | `@gsap/react`                 | React integration for GSAP (helps with useGSAP hooks, etc.).       | | `three`                       | Core Three.js library for 3D rendering.                            | | `@react-three/fiber`          | React renderer for Three.js (lets you use Three.js in JSX).        | | `@react-three/drei`           | Useful helpers/components (like OrbitControls, Environment, etc.). | | `@react-three/postprocessing` | Postprocessing effects like bloom, SSAO, depth of field, etc.      |
